name: Galaxy War Striker
description:
In 2025, civil war broke out in the solar system. Aliens organized a powerful star fleet to launch a terrorist attack to the Earth. They attempt to use their force to rule the Earth and the solar system. People on the Earth fight back, using three types of plane-fighter jets, which are newly developed and equipped with modern weapons, to start fighting back.You are one of the fighters and you will drive a plane to take down those enemies,this is a war that decides the future of the Earth,so there's no turning back once you step into the plane,all you have to do is to take down those warplanes with your powerful weapons,watch for the enemy bullets!
Features:
-a sci-fi combat game
-many types of alternative aircraft fight in space.
-a creative points with distinctive features
-smooth screen performance
-refreshing battle and magnificent barrage.
-a personalized operation of full-screen touch
-beautiful pictures, real-timely sound, create true feelings there for players.
